body_html:
I found that Y channel is OK but U, V channels are all zero because of low android version.
It was fixed in Android 5.1.1

https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=81984

If Android version can be checked in code and it is below 5.1, please use only Y channel to make input RGB image. Performance is much better.

body:
I found that Y channel is OK but U, V channels are all zero because of low android version.
It was fixed in Android 5.1.1

https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=81984

If Android version can be checked in code and it is below 5.1, please use only Y channel to make input RGB image. Performance is much better.
